name: Bug Game (theCommAndrew)
description:
Your computer is full of bugs and you need to "resolve" them before your corrupted code catches up with you!

Explore for loot, collect powerups, and race the deadline.

Controls:

WASD - move

Mouse & M1 - aim and fire

Space - dash/dodge

1,2,3 - swap weapons

R - reload (also happens automatically on emptying a clip)

Downloaded version has better time scaling/performance

GitHub repo can be seen here - https://github.com/theCommAndrew/GameJam_2021
